Topic: Draw a string telephone between two students.
Level Description: Proficient (shows most elements clearly and correctly)
CAN: The student can illustrate a simple string telephone with two cups connected by a string.
The student can depict that sound travels along the string from one cup to the other.
The student can show both students holding the string taut to illustrate that it needs to be stretched to work properly.
The student may include arrows or lines to indicate sound traveling along the string.
CANNOT: The student might omit labeling the string as 'tight' or may not clearly show its function in sound transmission.
The student may not emphasize how the device solves the problem of communication over a distance (e.g., might not show or explain that the cups amplify sound).
The student might not depict minor details, such as vibrations in the string (may indicate sound but not how it's transmitted).
